title: 118: Bachelor Recap: Episode 5 (Pilot Pete & The Kelsey Conflict)
itunes:title: 118: Bachelor Recap: Episode 5 (Pilot Pete & The Kelsey Conflict)
description:
"Wow…we are lost for words…just kidding, we have a hell of a lot to say.” The Broads discuss their disappointment with this overall group, their shift in “favorites”, the finishing of Alayah, Pete’s cement head aka stitch city, all the catastrophes in Costa Rica, and so much more! Diving into more drama in their upcoming recap - out Thursday AM! 
FOLLOW @: 
Follow along at @chattybroads
Follow Bekah Martinez at @bekah
Follow Jess Ambrose at @thebaddmom
